summary.para: 所有在线 Office 激活后端类应当实现的接口，包含一系列在线激活必要的函数定义

Directory where Office Software Protection Platform (ospp.vbs) file is located

Indicates whether the key is set successfully, return if successful

Indicates whether the key is set successfully, return if successful

Indicates whether the KMS server is set successfully, return if successful

type wrapped by , return when an update is available

summary.para: 以指定的参数运行一个进程
Run a process with specified parameters

param.name: execName
param.para: 要执行的进程的名称，如 "cmd.exe"
Name of the process to be executed, such as "cmd.exe"

param.name: execParams
param.para: 要传递给进程的参数，如 "/c echo Hello World"，可为空
Parameters to be passed to the process, such as "/c echo Hello World", can be null

param.name: workingDirectory
param.para: 进程的工作目录，如 "D:\"，若为空则默认为 "C:\Windows\System32"
Working directory of the process, such as "D:\", if null then default to "C:\Windows\System32"

param.name: isSilent
param.para: 是否以静默模式运行进程，即不显示进程的窗口
Whether to run the process in silent mode, that is, without displaying the window of the process

returns.para: 进程的标准输出
Standard output of the process

summary.para: 本类用于存放一系列 Office 激活密钥的字典等内容
This class is used to store a series of dictionaries of Office activation keys and other content
支持的 Office 的专业增强版（即Pro Plus/LTSC 版）的批量在线激活密钥
Volume online activation key for supported Office Pro Plus/LTSC editions
所有支持的 Office 版本名称枚举
Enumeration of all supported Office edition names
不支持的 Office 版本
不支持的 Visio 版本
存放与实现所有与 Office 安装与配置相关信息的类
Class that stores and implements all information related to Office installation and configuration
已安装的 Office 版本名称，未安装或无法识别时默认为
Installed Office edition name, default to when not installed or cannot be recognized
已安装的 Visio 版本名称，未安装或无法识别时默认为
Installed Visio edition name, default to when not installed or cannot be recognized
指示程序是否已找到 Office 的安装核心目录
Indicates whether the program has found the installation core directory of Office
指示是否已检测到当前 Office 已处于激活状态
Indicates whether the current Office has been detected to be activated
指示当前 Office 是否仍未安装任何密钥
Indicates whether the current Office has not yet installed any keys
Office Software Protection Platform (ospp.vbs) 文件所在目录，未找到时为
Directory where the Office Software Protection Platform (ospp.vbs) file is located, when not found
存放批量授权证书的目录，未找到时为
Directory where the volume licensing certificate is stored, when not found
当 Office 版本发生变化时应当触发的事件，便于向外部传递变化消息
Event that should be triggered when the Office version changes, making it easier to pass change messages to the outside

刷新 Office 信息以获取最新的 Office 状态
Refresh Office information to get the latest Office status

Office edition to install the certificate

Indicates whether the installation is successful, return if successful

summary.para: 在线 Office 激活对象的无参构造函数
Parameterless constructor of the online Office activator object
本类用于存放一系列 Visio 激活密钥的字典等内容
This class is used to store a series of dictionaries of Visio activation keys and other content
支持的 Visio 的专业增强版（即Pro Plus/LTSC 版）的批量在线激活密钥
Volume online activation key for supported Visio Pro Plus/LTSC editions
存放 Windows 激活密钥
存放 Windows 在线激活密钥，使用 枚举作为键
Stores Windows online activation keys, using enumeration as the key
该静态类包含了一系列与 Windows 系统信息相关的属性与方法
This static class contains a series of properties and methods related to Windows system information
The product name of the Windows system
Whether the Windows system is activated
Windows 系统是否为正式版本而非评估版本（主要针对 Windows Server）
Whether the Windows system is a release version rather than an evaluation version (mainly for Windows Server)
当 Windows 系统的产品名称发生变化时引发的事件
此事件主要用于在产品名称发生变化时通知其它对象获取更新
** 未来将逐步改为更加完善的事件机制 **
The event that is raised when the product name of the Windows system changes
This event is mainly used to notify other objects to get updated when the product name changes
** Will gradually be replaced by a more complete event mechanism in the future **
检查 Windows 系统的激活状态
Check the activation status of the Windows system
获取 Windows 系统的产品名称
Get the product name of the Windows system
检查 Windows 系统是否为正式版本而非评估版
Check whether the Windows system is a release version rather than an evaluation version
初始化 Windows 系统信息
刷新 Windows 系统信息，效果同初始化信息
Refresh Windows system information, the same effect as initializing information
获取 Windows 产品的对应批量激活密钥
Get the corresponding volume activation key of the Windows product

param.name: windowsProduct
param.para: 需要激活的 Windows 产品名称
The name of the Windows product that needs to be activated

returns.para: 返回对应的激活密钥
Return the corresponding activation key

summary.para: 将 Windows 产品转换为对应的批量激活版本，若当前系统已为正式版，则不会有任何动作
Convert the Windows product to the corresponding volume activation version, if the current system is already a release version, there will be no action

param.name: targetWindowsProduct
param.para: 需要转换的目标 Windows 产品名称
The target Windows product name to be converted

param.name: isReleaseVersionCurrent
param.para: 当前系统的版本是否已经为正式版本
Whether the current version of the system is already a release version

returns.para: 一个 值，指示是否已成功转换，若系统已为正式版则直接返回
A value indicating whether the conversion was successful, if the system is already a release version, it will return directly
